The number of participants is two.
The students are required to report and register with the event coordinators and collect their case at 9.30 am from MBA department. Competition would start at 10.30 am.
Participants are required to give a power point presentation of the case in not more than 12+3 minutes time.
Participants must submit the softcopy of their presentation to the faculty coordinators half an hour before the competition.
This event is open to undergraduates and Post graduates students from all streams.

This event is open to undergraduates and Post graduates students from all streams.
 Maximum 3 teams from each college
Maximum 3 participants per team.
No entrant can be part of more than one team.
The organizers reserve the right to make any changes to the event, format, date, rules and any matter related to this event, at any time before or during the event.

This event is open to undergraduates and post graduates students from all streams.
 Maximum 3 teams from each college.
Maximum 3 participants per team.
No entrant can be part of more than one team.

General Guidelines: 

There are three topics, i.e., ‘Entrepreneurship’, ‘Tourism’ and ‘Consumerism’.
The submissions must include 1 Video and 1 print AD.
The duration of the video should be between 00:45-1:00 minutes. The video must be rendered in MP4 format. The print AD should be an image in JPG format with a resolution of 300 DPI.
The last date for submissions is 22nd march, 2015.
The materials should not contain any objectionable content. Obscenity and vulgarity will lead to disqualification of the team.
The video shall be uploaded on our revamp facebook page. The additional criteria would be maximum possible likes on both video and print ad.
